verses.verse: It happened, <WH2985> when Jabin king <WH4428> of Hazor <WH2674> heard <WH8085> of it, <WH7971> that he sent to Jobab <WH3103> king <WH4428> of Madon, <WH4068> to the king <WH4428> of Shimron, <WH8110> to the king <WH4428> of Achshaph, <WH407>

and to the kings <WH4428> who were on the north, <WH6828> in the hill country, <WH2022> in the Arabah <WH6160> south <WH5045> of Chinneroth, <WH3672> in the lowland, <WH8219> and in the heights <WH5299> of Dor <WH1756> on the west, <WH3220>

to the Canaanite <WH3669> on the east <WH4217> and on the west, <WH3220> and the Amorite, <WH567> and the Hittite, <WH2850> and the Perizzite, <WH6522> and the Jebusite <WH2983> in the hill country, <WH2022> and the Hivite <WH2340> under Hermon <WH2768> in the land <WH776> of Mizpah. <WH4709>

They went out, <WH3318> they and all their armies <WH4264> with them, <WH7227> many people, <WH5971> even as the sand <WH2344> that is on the <WH3220> seashore <WH8193> in multitude, <WH7230> with very <WH3966> many <WH7227> horses <WH5483> and chariots. <WH7393>
All these kings <WH4428> met together; <WH3259> and they came <WH935> and encamped <WH2583> together <WH3259> at the waters <WH4325> of Merom, <WH4792> to fight <WH3898> with Israel. <WH3478>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> "Don't <WH3372> be afraid because <WH6440> of them; <WH4279> for tomorrow at this time, <WH6256> I will deliver them up <WH5414> all slain <WH2491> before <WH6440> Israel. <WH3478> You shall hamstring <WH6131> their horses <WH5483> and burn <WH8313> their chariots <WH4818> with fire. <WH784>"
So Joshua <WH3091> came, <WH935> and all the people <WH5971> of war <WH4421> with him, <WH4325> against them by the waters of Merom <WH4792> suddenly, <WH6597> and fell on them. <WH5307>

Yahweh <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of Israel, <WH3478> and they struck <WH5221> them, <WH7291> and chased them to great <WH7227> Sidon, <WH6721> and to Misrephoth Maim, <WH4956> and to the valley <WH1237> of Mizpeh <WH4708> eastward. <WH4217> They struck <WH5221> them until they left <WH7604> them none remaining. <WH8300>
Joshua <WH3091> did <WH6213> to them as Yahweh <WH3068> told <WH559> him. <WH6131> He hamstrung their horses <WH5483> and burnt <WH8313> their chariots <WH4818> with fire. <WH784>

Joshua <WH3091> turned back <WH7725> at that time, <WH6256> and took <WH3920> Hazor, <WH2674> and struck <WH5221> its king <WH4428> with the sword: <WH2719> for Hazor <WH2674> used <WH6440> to be the head <WH7218> of all those kingdoms. <WH4467>

They struck <WH5221> all the souls <WH5315> who were in it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> utterly destroying <WH2763> them. <WH3498> There was no one left who breathed. <WH5397> He burnt <WH8313> Hazor <WH2674> with fire. <WH784>

Joshua <WH3091> captured <WH3920> all the cities <WH5892> of those kings, <WH4428> with their kings, <WH4428> and he struck <WH5221> them with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> and utterly destroyed <WH2763> them; <WH4872> as Moses the servant <WH5650> of Yahweh <WH3068> commanded. <WH6680>
But as for the cities <WH5892> that stood <WH5975> on their mounds, <WH8510> Israel <WH3478> burned <WH8313> none of them, <WH2108> except Hazor <WH2674> only. <WH3091> Joshua burned that. <WH8313>

The children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> took all the spoil <WH7998> of these cities, <WH5892> with the livestock, <WH929> as spoils <WH962> for themselves; <WH120> but every man they struck <WH5221> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> until they had destroyed <WH8045> them. <WH7604> They didn't leave any who breathed. <WH5397>

As Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> his servant, <WH5650> so Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> Joshua. <WH3091> Joshua <WH3091> did <WH6213> so. <WH5493> He left nothing <WH1697> undone <WH5493> of all that Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>

So Joshua <WH3091> captured <WH3947> all that land, <WH776> the hill country, <WH5045> all the South, <WH5045> all the land <WH5045> of Goshen, <WH1657> the lowland, <WH8219> the Arabah, <WH6160> the hill <WH2022> country of Israel, <WH3478> and the lowland of the same; <WH8219>

from Mount <WH2022> Halak, <WH2510> that goes up <WH5927> to Seir, <WH8165> even to Baal Gad <WH1171> in the valley <WH1237> of Lebanon <WH3844> under Mount <WH2022> Hermon. <WH2768> He took <WH3920> all their kings, <WH4428> struck <WH5221> them, <WH4191> and put them to death.
Joshua <WH3091> made <WH6213> war <WH4421> a long <WH7227> time <WH3117> with all those kings. <WH4428>

There was not a city <WH5892> that made peace <WH7999> with the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> except the Hivites, <WH2340> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Gibeon. <WH1391> They took <WH3947> all in battle. <WH4421>

For it was of Yahweh <WH3068> to harden <WH2388> their hearts, <WH3820> to come against <WH7125> Israel <WH3478> in battle, <WH4421> that he might utterly <WH2763> destroy them, <WH8467> that they might have no favor, but that he might destroy <WH8045> them, <WH3068> as Yahweh commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>

Joshua <WH3091> came <WH935> at that time, <WH6256> and cut off <WH3772> the Anakim <WH6062> from the hill country, <WH2022> from Hebron, <WH2275> from Debir, <WH1688> from Anab, <WH6024> and from all the hill country <WH2022> of Judah, <WH3063> and from all the hill country <WH2022> of Israel: <WH3478> Joshua <WH3091> utterly <WH2763> destroyed them with their cities. <WH5892>

There were none of the Anakim <WH6062> left <WH3498> in the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478> Only in Gaza, <WH5804> in Gath, <WH1661> and in Ashdod, <WH795> did some remain. <WH7604>

So Joshua <WH3091> took <WH3947> the whole land, <WH776> according to all that Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses; <WH4872> and Joshua <WH3091> gave <WH5414> it for an inheritance <WH5159> to Israel <WH3478> according to their divisions <WH4256> by their tribes. <WH7626> The land <WH776> had rest <WH8252> from war. <WH4421>
